alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Cassia; Lincoln; Minidoka; Power (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 4:01PM MDT until May 24 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Blaine County in central Idaho... Southeastern Lincoln County in south central Idaho... Northwestern Power County in southeastern Idaho... North central Cassia County in southeastern Idaho... Southern Minidoka County in south central Idaho... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 400 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rupert, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Golf ball size hail was reported with this storm in Burley. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rupert, Lake Walcott, Minidoka, Acequia, Bear Trap Airport and Pilar Butte. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
